nodes.text: Drake Squadron was a fictitious TIE interceptor unit that supposedly belonged to Zsinj, but whose members were actually pilots of Wraith Squadron.
Four starfighters belonging to Drake Squadron landed on Kidriff 5 in 8 ABY to help cover the retreat of the Millennium Falsehood
The four known fighters of Drake Squadron were led by Kell Tainer, and they all posed as Imperial officers in need of recreation.
Drake Squadron was equipped with TIE interceptors, which their pilots initially flew as if they were equipped with hyperdrives and navicomputers. However, they were not.
